metadata.title: CVE-2024-2191 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.9 prior to 16.11.5, starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.3, andstarting from 17.1 prior to 17.1.1, which allows merge request title to bevisible publicly despite being set as project members only.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
